summary: The diff updates the header and footer logo sources to `/assets/generated/logo-quillworks.dim_512x256.png` and adds a Twitter/X link in the footer with the correct URL, `target="_blank"`, `rel="noopener noreferrer"`, and an aria-label. However, the diff does not show the new generated logo asset being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and it introduces a new footer attribution/link that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the uploaded image as the new logo via a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated (new generated logo file) and update all logo references to the new filename across the site (header and footer).
missing_requirements.reason: Header/footer references were updated to the new filename, but the diff shows no new file added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, so the actual required static asset addition is not evidenced.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" (no new asset file added)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new footer attribution section with a heart icon and an external link to caffeine.ai ("Â© 2026. Built with ... using caffeine.ai").
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request adding or changing attribution content/links; non-goals include changing page copy beyond what is necessary for the new logo and Twitter/X link.
